metadata.name: Regsvr32 DLL Execution With Uncommon Extension
metadata.comment: Detects a "regsvr32" execution where the DLL doesn't contain a common file extension.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regsvr32.exe') AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ax')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ocx')) OR process.cmd_line is null OR lower(process.cmd_line) = lower('')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ppl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bav'))))

output.summary: Detects a "regsvr32" execution where the DLL doesn't contain a common file extension.

metadata.objective: False positive: Other legitimate extensions currently not in the list either from third party or specific Windows components. Reference: https://app.any.run/tasks/34221348-072d-4b70-93f3-aa71f6ebecad/
